item.title: Mari add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Mari add a quote by Patrick Rothfuss
item.description: "Congratulations. That was the stupidest thing I've ever seen. Ever." -- Patrick Rothfuss

item.title: Mari add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Mari add a quote by Patrick Rothfuss
item.description: "Words are pale shadows of forgotten names. As names have power, words have power. Words can light fires in the minds of men. Words can wring tears from the hardest hearts." -- Patrick Rothfuss

item.title: Mari add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Mari add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "The Road goes ever on and on Down from the door where it began. Now far ahead the Road has gone, And I must follow, if I can, Pursuing it with eager feet, Until it joins some larger way Where many paths and errands meet. And whither then? I cannot say" -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Mari add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Do not meddle in the affairs of wizards, for they are subtle and quick to anger." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Mari add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "There is some good in this world, and it's worth fighting for." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Mari add a quote by Patrick Rothfuss
item.description: "It's like everyone tells a story about themselves inside their own head. Always. All the time. That story makes you what you are. We build ourselves out of that story." -- Patrick Rothfuss

item.title: Mari add a quote by Patrick Rothfuss
item.description: "You see, women are like fires, like flames. Some women are like candles, bright and friendly. Some are like single sparks, or embers, like fireflies for chasing on summer nights. Some are like campfires, all light and heat for a night and willing to be left after. Some women are like hearthfires, not much to look at but underneath they are all warm red coal that burns a long, long while." -- Patrick Rothfuss

item.title: Mari add a quote by Patrick Rothfuss
item.description: "We understand how dangerous a mask can be. We all become what we pretend to be." -- Patrick Rothfuss

item.title: Mari add a quote by Patrick Rothfuss
item.description: "You lack the requisite spine and testicular fortitude to study under me." -- Patrick Rothfuss

item.title: Mari add a quote by Patrick Rothfuss
item.description: "Its like he knows he's better than you, but doesn't look down on you for it because he knows it's not your fault." -- Patrick Rothfuss
